content.description: Intricate and powerful climbing through orange streaked stone. The rock is bullet and the climbing is engaging the entire way. Climbs through undulating scoops and bulges until it merges with Cancer Crack to the left.
content.location: On the wall left of the main corner. Look for a bolt line trending leftward to a shared anchor with Cancer Crack.

content.description: Climb pockets, popcorn, and tufas up to the low angle corner. Bust out left and into a technical overhanging dihedral. Awesome movement between the steep overhung wall on the right and the thin wall on the left lead to chains.
content.location: Start up the low angle corner clipping two shared fixed draws. Follow the bolt line left into the dihedral.

content.description: Climb a crack to a stance. Head up the thinning seam with increasingly difficulty until you pull onto the sharp blue stone above. Tip toe to chains.
content.location: Crack system on the wall left of the main corner.

content.description: This area starts to the left of the cave with some going into the cave it's self.
